scripts.run-redis: docker run --rm --name redis -p 6378:6379 redis redis-server --loglevel notice
scripts.run-postgres: docker run --rm -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password --name postgres -p 5432:5432 postgres:15 postgres -c log_statement=all
scripts.run-postgres-persist: docker run --rm -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password --name postgres -p 5432:5432 -v ./pgdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data postgres:15 postgres -c log_statement=all
